overview: The Finnish modern dancer Noora Hannula dances through this documentary film in her own explosive style. Nooraâ€™s life has always been very connected to the artist environment with her grandfather, Simo Hannula, who throughout his entire life dedicated him fully to his art. Noora and her grandfather crossed paths when Noora used a picture of his dead body in her show and now we meet Noora working on her newest show: The Era of No Talent Rising, while she is trying to figure out where her own limits are.
title: Portrait of A Dancer
